item.title: Projects
item.description: Vritually all my projects are me reading a book and trying stuff out. I guess I’m not there yet. tlpi This is a collection of numerous Linux system programs in C. I wrote this following examples and exercises from the book The Linux Programming Interface. This was one of my first introductions to C and by far the most fun book on programming. C programming and operating systems, this book made me better at both.
